Title: Quo Vadis
Writer: John Lee Mahin (screen play), S.N. Behrman (screen play), Sonya Levien (screen play), Henryk Sienkiewicz (based on the novel by)
Actors: Robert Taylor, Deborah Kerr, Leo Genn, Peter Ustinov
Plot: Fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia and begins questioning the tyrannical leadership of the despot Emperor Nero.
Awards: Nominated for 8 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 3 nominations.
